mapper.select:
WITH "beforeAfterShohon" AS ( WITH "ShohonKijunYMD" AS ( SELECT "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo", "AfT100Shohon"."senkyoShurui", "AfT100Shohon"."shoriYMD" AS "shoriYMD", MAX("AfT111Senkyo"."kijunYMD") AS "kijunYMD" FROM rgaf."AfT100Shohon" AS "AfT100Shohon" INNER JOIN rgaf."AfT111Senkyo" AS "AfT111Senkyo" ON "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" = "AfT111Senkyo"."shohonNo" GROUP BY "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo", "AfT100Shohon"."senkyoShurui", "AfT100Shohon"."shoriYMD" ) SELECT "ShohonKijunYMD1"."shohonNo" AS "shohonNo1", "ShohonKijunYMD1"."kijunYMD" AS "kijunYMD", MAX("ShohonKijunYMD2"."shohonNo") AS "shohonNo2" FROM "ShohonKijunYMD" AS "ShohonKijunYMD1" LEFT OUTER JOIN "ShohonKijunYMD" AS "ShohonKijunYMD2" ON "ShohonKijunYMD1"."shoriYMD" > "ShohonKijunYMD2"."shoriYMD" AND "ShohonKijunYMD1"."kijunYMD" > "ShohonKijunYMD2"."kijunYMD" AND (("ShohonKijunYMD1"."shohonNo" < 10000 AND "ShohonKijunYMD2"."shohonNo" < 10000) OR ("ShohonKijunYMD1"."shohonNo" >= 10000 AND "ShohonKijunYMD2"."shohonNo" >= 10000)) and(("ShohonKijunYMD1"."senkyoShurui" in ('0','1') AND "ShohonKijunYMD2"."senkyoShurui" in ('0','1')) OR "ShohonKijunYMD1"."senkyoShurui" = "ShohonKijunYMD2"."senkyoShurui") WHERE "ShohonKijunYMD1"."shohonNo" = #{shohonNo} GROUP BY "ShohonKijunYMD1"."shohonNo", "ShohonKijunYMD1"."kijunYMD" )
,"AfT113Seq" AS ( SELECT "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku"."shikibetsuCode", MAX("AfT113SenkyoShikaku"."seq") AS seq FROM rgaf."AfT100Shohon" AS "AfT100Shohon" INNER JOIN "beforeAfterShohon" AS "beforeAfterShohon" ON "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" = "beforeAfterShohon"."shohonNo1" OR "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" = "beforeAfterShohon"."shohonNo2" INNER JOIN rgaf."AfT113SenkyoShikaku" AS "AfT113SenkyoShikaku" ON "AfT113SenkyoShikaku"."senkyoShurui" = (CASE WHEN "AfT100Shohon"."senkyoShurui" = '1' THEN '0' ELSE "AfT100Shohon"."senkyoShurui" END) AND "AfT113SenkyoShikaku"."dataTorokuYMD" < "AfT100Shohon"."shoriYMD" GROUP BY "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku"."shikibetsuCode")
, master AS ( SELECT "beforeAfterShohon"."kijunYMD" as "maxKijunYMD" ,
,
,
,
,
,
FROM rgaf."AfV112SenkyoninMeibo" AS "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo" INNER JOIN rgaf."AfT100Shohon" AS "AfT100Shohon" ON "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" = "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo"."shohonNo" AND "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" = #{shohonNo} INNER JOIN "AfT113Seq" AS "AfT113Seq1" ON "AfT113Seq1"."shohonNo" = "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" AND "AfT113Seq1"."shikibetsuCode" = "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo"."shikibetsuCode" INNER JOIN rgaf."AfT113SenkyoShikaku" AS "AfT113SenkyoShikaku" ON "AfT113SenkyoShikaku"."shikibetsuCode" = "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo"."shikibetsuCode" AND "AfT113SenkyoShikaku"."senkyoShurui" = (CASE WHEN "AfT100Shohon"."senkyoShurui" = '1' THEN '0' ELSE "AfT100Shohon"."senkyoShurui" END) AND "AfT113Seq1".seq = "AfT113SenkyoShikaku".seq
INNER JOIN "beforeAfterShohon" ON "beforeAfterShohon"."shohonNo1" = "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo"
INNER JOIN rgaf."AfT100Shohon" AS "AfT100Shohon2" ON "beforeAfterShohon"."shohonNo2" = "AfT100Shohon2"."shohonNo" INNER JOIN rgaf."AfV112SenkyoninMeibo" AS "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2" ON "beforeAfterShohon"."shohonNo2" = "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."shohonNo" AND "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo"."shikibetsuCode" = "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."shikibetsuCode" INNER JOIN "AfT113Seq" AS "AfT113Seq2" ON "AfT113Seq2"."shohonNo" = "beforeAfterShohon"."shohonNo2" AND "AfT113Seq2"."shikibetsuCode" = "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."shikibetsuCode" INNER JOIN rgaf."AfT113SenkyoShikaku" AS "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2" ON "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."shikibetsuCode" = "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."shikibetsuCode" AND "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."senkyoShurui" = (CASE WHEN "AfT100Shohon2"."senkyoShurui" = '1' THEN '0' ELSE "AfT100Shohon2"."senkyoShurui" END) AND "AfT113Seq2".seq = "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2".seq
) , masterPSM as ( SELECT * FROM
( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(CAST ("afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode" AS TEXT)) FROM master )
)
, "UaFt200RirekiNo" AS ( WITH "meiboTorokuYMDTable" AS ( SELECT "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo", MIN("AfT111Senkyo"."meiboTorokuYMD") AS "meiboTorokuYMD" FROM rgaf."AfT100Shohon" AS "AfT100Shohon" INNER JOIN "beforeAfterShohon" AS "beforeAfterShohon" ON "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" = "beforeAfterShohon"."shohonNo2" INNER JOIN rgaf."AfT111Senkyo" AS "AfT111Senkyo" ON "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo" = "AfT111Senkyo"."shohonNo" GROUP BY "AfT100Shohon"."shohonNo") SELECT "meiboTorokuYMDTable"."shohonNo", "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode", MAX("ShikibetsuTaisho"."rirekiNo") AS "rirekiNo" FROM "meiboTorokuYMDTable" INNER JOIN masterPSM AS "ShikibetsuTaisho" ON "meiboTorokuYMDTable"."meiboTorokuYMD" > "ShikibetsuTaisho"."idoYMD" GROUP BY "meiboTorokuYMDTable"."shohonNo", "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode")
SELECT master.* , "ShikibetsuTaisho"."idoJiyuCode" = '30' as "idoJiyuCode_tenKyo" , "ShikibetsuTaisho2"."tohyokuCode" as "before_tohyokuCode" ,
, "ShikibetsuTaisho2".* FROM master INNER JOIN ( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(CAST ("afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode" AS TEXT)) FROM master )
AS ON ."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo_shikibetsuCode" AND "ShikibetsuTaisho"."idoJiyuCode" IN
#{idoJiyuCode}
INNER JOIN "UaFt200RirekiNo" AS "UaFt200RirekiNo2" ON "UaFt200RirekiNo2"."shohonNo" = master."afT100Shohon2_shohonNo" AND "UaFt200RirekiNo2"."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_shikibetsuCode" INNER JOIN masterPSM AS "ShikibetsuTaisho2" ON "ShikibetsuTaisho2"."shikibetsuCode" = master."afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_shikibetsuCode" AND "ShikibetsuTaisho2"."rirekiNo" = "UaFt200RirekiNo2"."rirekiNo"
${sort}
mapper.sql: "AfT100Shohon2"."shohonNo" as "afT100Shohon2_shohonNo", "AfT100Shohon2"."insertDantaiCd" as "afT100Shohon2_insertDantaiCd", "AfT100Shohon2"."insertTimestamp" as "afT100Shohon2_insertTimestamp", "AfT100Shohon2"."insertReamsLoginId" as "afT100Shohon2_insertReamsLoginId", "AfT100Shohon2"."insertContextId" as "afT100Shohon2_insertContextId", "AfT100Shohon2"."isDeleted" as "afT100Shohon2_isDeleted", "AfT100Shohon2"."updateCount" as "afT100Shohon2_updateCount", "AfT100Shohon2"."lastUpdateTimestamp" as "afT100Shohon2_lastUpdateTimestamp", "AfT100Shohon2"."lastUpdateReamsLoginId" as "afT100Shohon2_lastUpdateReamsLoginId", "AfT100Shohon2"."senkyoShurui" as "afT100Shohon2_senkyoShurui", "AfT100Shohon2"."shohonName" as "afT100Shohon2_shohonName", "AfT100Shohon2"."tohyoYMD" as "afT100Shohon2_tohyoYMD", "AfT100Shohon2"."kiteiNenreiTotatsuYMD" as "afT100Shohon2_kiteiNenreiTotatsuYMD", "AfT100Shohon2"."shoriYMD" as "afT100Shohon2_shoriYMD", "AfT100Shohon2"."nyujokenReportIndex" as "afT100Shohon2_nyujokenReportIndex"

"AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."shohonNo" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_shohonNo", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."groupCode" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_groupCode", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."tohyokuCode" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_tohyokuCode", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."satsu" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_satsu", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."page" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_page", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."gyo" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_gyo", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."seq" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_seq", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."insertDantaiCd" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_insertDantaiCd", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."insertTimestamp" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_insertTimestamp", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."insertReamsLoginId" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_insertReamsLoginId", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."insertContextId" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_insertContextId", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."isDeleted" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_isDeleted", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."updateCount" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_updateCount", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."lastUpdateTimestamp" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_lastUpdateTimestamp", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."lastUpdateReamsLoginId" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_lastUpdateReamsLoginId", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."shikibetsuCode" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_shikibetsuCode", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."tohyokuHenkoMasshoFlag" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_tohyokuHenkoMasshoFlag", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."renban" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_renban", "AfT112SenkyoninMeibo2"."edaban" as "afT112SenkyoninMeibo2_edaban"

"AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."senkyoShurui" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_senkyoShurui", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."shikibetsuCode" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_shikibetsuCode", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."seq" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_seq", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."insertDantaiCd" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_insertDantaiCd", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."insertTimestamp" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_insertTimestamp", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."insertReamsLoginId" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_insertReamsLoginId", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."insertContextId" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_insertContextId", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."isDeleted" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_isDeleted", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."updateCount" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_updateCount", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."lastUpdateTimestamp" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_lastUpdateTimestamp", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."lastUpdateReamsLoginId" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_lastUpdateReamsLoginId", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."shikakuKubun" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_shikakuKubun", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."tohyokuCode" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_tohyokuCode", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."meiboTorokuYMD" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_meiboTorokuYMD", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."torokuJiyuCode" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_torokuJiyuCode", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."torokuTeishiYMD" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_torokuTeishiYMD", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."torokuTeishiJiyuCode" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_torokuTeishiJiyuCode", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."hyojiYMD" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_hyojiYMD", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."hyojiJiyuCode" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_hyojiJiyuCode", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."hyojiShojoYMD" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_hyojiShojoYMD", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."hyojiShojoYoteiYMD" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_hyojiShojoYoteiYMD", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."masshoYMD" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_masshoYMD", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."masshoJiyuCode" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_masshoJiyuCode", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."keikiShuryoYMD" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_keikiShuryoYMD", "AfT113SenkyoShikaku2"."nikeimochiFlag" as "afT113SenkyoShikaku2_nikeimochiFlag"
SELECT "senkyo"."shohonNo" as "shohonNo", MAX("senkyo"."kijunYMD") as "maxKijunYMD" FROM rgaf."AfT111Senkyo" as "senkyo" GROUP BY "senkyo"."shohonNo"
